tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_assessment (
  assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  assessment_name VARCHAR(255),
  assessment_date DATE,
  vulnerability_count INT,
  remediation_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE security_assessments (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_name VARCHAR(50),
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessment_type VARCHAR(50),
    severity_level VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerability_scans (
    scan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    scan_name VARCHAR(50),
    scan_date DATE,
    scan_type VARCHAR(50),
    scan_results TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE assessment_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_id INT,
    scan_id INT,
    scan_date DATE,
    risk_level VARCHAR(20),
    remediation_steps TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE remediation_actions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    result_id INT,
    action_description TEXT,
    action_status VARCHAR(20),
    completion_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SecurityAssessments (
   assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   assessment_name VARCHAR(255),
   assessment_date DATE,
   assessor_name VARCHAR(255),
   assessment_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE VulnerabilityScans (
   scan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   scan_date DATE,
   scanned_system VARCHAR(255),
   vulnerability_name VARCHAR(255),
   severity_level VARCHAR(50)
);
